text: Paul Edward Haggis (born March 10, 1953) is a Canadian screenwriter, movie producer, and movie director. He is best known as screenwriter and producer for the Best Picture Oscar winners: Million Dollar Baby (2004) and Crash (2005). He also directed the James Bond movies Casino Royale (2006) and Quantum of Solace (2008). Haggis was sued for an alleged sexual assault claim in New York City in 2013. ==References== Category:1953 births Category:Living people Category:Canadian movie directors Category:Canadian screenwriters Category:Canadian movie producers Category:Writers from London, Ontario Category:Canadian television writers Category:Emmy Award winners Category:Academy Award winning writers Category:BAFTA Award winning writers Category:Satellite Award winners
title: Paul Haggis
